item.title: lisa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "I wanted to be one of those people who have streaks to maintain, who scorch the ground with their intensity. But for now, at least I knew such people, and they needed me, just like comets need tails." -- John Green

item.title: lisa add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "Sometimes I think my papa is an accordion. When he looks at me and smiles and breathes, I hear the notes." -- Markus Zusak

item.title: lisa add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "Sometimes you read a book so special that you want to carry it around with you for months after you've finished just to stay near it." -- Markus Zusak

item.title: lisa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "So I walked back to my room and collapsed on the bottom bunk, thinking that if people were rain, I was drizzle and she was a hurricane." -- John Green

item.title: lisa add a quote by David Levithan
item.description:
"Because the song is us and the song is her and this time I’m going to use her name. Norah, Norah, Norah - no rhymes really. Just truth.
I shouldn’t want the song to end. I always think of each night as a song. Or each moment as a song. But now I’m seeing we don’t live in a single song. We move from song to song, from lyric to lyric, from chord to chord. There is no ending here. It’s an infinite playlist." -- David Levithan

item.title: lisa add a quote by Rachel Cohn
item.description: "[S]he leans into this guy and rocks her head like I’m making this music for her, when if I could, I would take it all away and give her as much silence as she’s given me pain. " -- Rachel Cohn

item.title: lisa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "You know your problem, Quentin? You keep expecting people not to be themselves. I mean, I could hate you for being massively unpunctual and for never being interested in anything other than Margo Roth Spiegelman, and for, like, never asking me about how it's going with my girlfriend - but I don't give a shit, man, because you're you. My parents have a shit ton of black Santas, but that's okay. They're them. I'm too obsessed with a reference website to answer my phone sometimes when my friends call, or my girlfriend. That's okay, too. That's me. You like me anyway. And I like you. You're funny, and you're smart, and you may show up late, but you always show up eventually." -- John Green

item.title: lisa add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "Is this the part where you say if I hurt her, you'll kill me?" "No" Simon said, "If you hurt Clary she's quite capable of killing you herself. Possibly with a variety of weapons." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: lisa add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "He does something to me, that boy. Every time. It’s his only detriment. He steps on my heart. He makes me cry." -- Markus Zusak

item.title: lisa add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "Papa was a man with silver eyes, not dead ones. Papa was an accordion! But his bellows were all empty. Nothing went in and nothing came out." -- Markus Zusak

item.title: lisa add a quote by Chip Kidd
item.description: "Never fall in love with an idea. They're whores: if the one you're with isn't doing the job, there's always, always, always another." -- Chip Kidd

item.title: lisa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Sometimes, you read a book and it fills you with this weird evangelical zeal, and you become convinced that the shattered world will never be put back together unless and until all living humans read the book." -- John Green

item.title: lisa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once." -- John Green

item.title: lisa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "My thoughts are stars I cannot fathom into constellations." -- John Green

item.title: lisa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Grief does not change you, Hazel. It reveals you." -- John Green

item.title: lisa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Whenever you read a cancer booklet or website or whatever, they always list depression among the side effects of cancer. But, in fact, depression is not a side effect of cancer. Depression is a side effect of dying." -- John Green

item.title: lisa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Some infinities are bigger than other infinities." -- John Green

item.title: lisa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "You don't get to choose if you get hurt in this world...but you do have some say in who hurts you. I like my choices." -- John Green

item.title: lisa add a quote by John Green
item.description:
"Some people don't understand the promises they're making when they make them," I said.
"Right, of course. But you keep the promise anyway. That's what love is. Love is keeping the promise anyway." -- John Green

item.title: lisa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "There was time before organisms experienced consciousness, and there will be time after. And if the inevitability of human oblivion worries you, I encourage you to ignore it." -- John Green

item.title: lisa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "You have a choice in this world, I believe, about how to tell sad stories, and we made the funny choice." -- John Green

item.title: lisa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "You are so busy being YOU that you have no idea how utterly unprecedented you are." -- John Green

item.title: lisa add a quote by John Green
item.description: "I'm a grenade and at some point I'm going to blow up and I would like to minimize the casualties, okay?" -- John Green

item.title: lisa add a quote by John Green
lisa add a quote by Scott Lynch
lisa add a quote by Scott Lynch
lisa add a quote by Scott Lynch
item.description: "There’s no freedom quite like the freedom of being constantly underestimated." -- Scott Lynch

item.title: lisa add a quote by Scott Lynch
lisa add a quote by Scott Lynch
item.description: "Worst of all, the inner vault is guarded by a live dragon, attended by fifty naked women armed with poisoned spears, each of them sworn to die in Requin's service. All redheads. -You're just making that up, Jean." -- Scott Lynch

item.title: lisa add a quote by Scott Lynch
item.description: "I can't wait to have words with the Gray King when this shit is all finished," Locke whispered. "There's a few things I want to ask him. Philosophical questions. Like, 'How does it feel to be dangled out a window by a rope tied around your balls, motherfucker?" -- Scott Lynch
